plot: Martin travels to China to compete in a martial arts competition and to find the story about his parents but he unexpectedly finds love in a special place.
title: Love on That Day
plot_es: Martin travels to China to compete in a martial arts competition and to find the story about his parents but he unexpectedly finds love in a special place.
plot_en: Martin travels to China to compete in a martial arts competition and to find the story about his parents but he unexpectedly finds love in a special place.
